gw.plugin.billing

Interface BillingPeriodInfo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BillingTermInfo

    public interface BillingPeriodInfo
extends BillingTermInfo
    The BillingPeriodInfo class provides:
    • The PolicyNumber as a String
    • The TermNumber as a Integer
    • The Product as a String
    • The PaymentPlanName as a String
    • The EffectiveDate as a Date
    • The ExpirationDate as a Date
    • The BillingMethod as a BillingMethod
    • The Delinquent as a Boolean
    • The TotalBilled as a MonetaryAmount
    • The PastDue as a MonetaryAmount
    • The Unbilled as a MonetaryAmount
    • The CurrentOutstanding as a MonetaryAmount
    • The DepositRequirement as a MonetaryAmount
    • The Paid as a MonetaryAmount
    • The WrittenOff as a MonetaryAmount
    • The TotalCharges as a MonetaryAmount
    • The Periods as an array of String
    • The Invoices as an array of BillingInvoiceInfo
    • The AltBillingAccount as a String
    • The InvoiceStream as a String
    • The OwningAccount as a String
    • The PCPolicyPublicID as a String
    • The PolicyPeriod as a PolicyPeriod
    • The Archived as a Boolean
    • The Retrieved as a Boolean

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  BillingPeriodInfo.PolicyTermInfo
      Defines a Policy term information instance.

      • isArchived

        java.lang.Boolean isArchived()
        Whether the policy period is archived in the billing system.
        Returns:
        True if the policy period is archived in the billing system. If this returns true then isRetrieved() must return false.

      • isRetrieved

        java.lang.Boolean isRetrieved()
        Whether the policy period was retrieved from archive in the billing system.
        Returns:
        True if the policy period was retrieved from archive in the billing system. If this returns true then isArchived() must return false.
